description: Creation of roof terrace to second floor rear elevation, with steps from existing rear roof extension and insertion of door; and installation of associated privacy screening
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: LOC-001 (Location Plan); BLK-001 (Existing and Proposed Block Plans); EX-001 (Existing Plans and Rear Elevation); PR-001 rev D (Proposed Plans, Rear Elevation and Section AA)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance the existing dwelling unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The timber trellis/fencing to the roof terrace hereby approved shall be implemented prior to the first use of the roof terrace and shall be permanently retained thereafter. Additionally, the screening vegetation proposed shall also be implemented prior to first occupation, shall be well maintained and shall be retained in perpetuity.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of neighbouring sites in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and the NPPF (2021).
